```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  include = TRUE,

library(cd2030.pooled)
library(dplyr)

cache <- params$cache
quality_data <- cache$quality_data
```

## National Data Quality by Country

### Overall Data Quality

```{r}
coverage_data <- quality_data %>%
          rename_with(tolower) %>%
          process_coverage_data(indicator = 'overall')
plot(coverage_data)
```
